chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
p: pos n
H: pos2nat p < n

Goal:
nat2pos H = p

Premises:
nat2pos : forall n x : nat, x < n -> pos n
Notation pos := Fin.t
pos2nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type]
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type]
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p0 : nat, p0 < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p0 = q where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n0 p0)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.R_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.R n0 p0)) = n0 + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (?m + n0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
Fin.R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
VectorDef.const : ?A -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n)) (P : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : VectorDef.t ?A ?n), P (VectorDef.cons ?A h ?n t)) -> P v where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
pos2nat_inj : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos2nat p = pos2nat q -> p = q
Fin.caseS' : forall (p0 : pos (S ?n)) (P : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p1 : pos ?n, P (pos_nxt p1)) -> P p0 where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- nat]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n0 v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n0 v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type]
pos2nat_prop : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), pos2nat p < n
Fin.of_nat_lt = fix of_nat_lt (p n : nat) {struct p} : p < n -> pos n := match n as n0 return (p < n0 -> pos n0) with | 0 => fun H : p < 0 => False_rect (pos 0) (Nat.nlt_0_r p H) | S n' => match p as p0 return (p0 < S n' -> pos (S n')) with | 0 => fun _ : 0 < S n' => pos0 | S p' => fun H : S p' < S n' => pos_nxt (of_nat_lt p' n' (lt_S_n p' n' H)) end end : forall p n : nat, p < n -> pos n Arguments Fin.of_nat_lt {p n}%nat_scope
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n H : pos2nat p < n |- Type]
pos2nat_nat2pos : forall (n i : nat) (H : i < n), pos2nat (nat2pos H) = i

```coq
unfold nat2pos in H.
rewrite pos2nat_prop in H.
assert (pos2nat p = H).
{
  apply pos2nat_inj.
  exact H.
}
rewrite H in *.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: unfold nat2pos in H. rewrite pos2nat_prop in H. assert (pos2nat p = H). { apply pos2nat_inj. apply H. } rewrite H in *. reflexivity.
